      • findAnnotatedMethods

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Method> findAnnotatedMethods(java.lang.Class<?> type,
                                                                            java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotation)
        Search the given Class for Methods annotated with the given annotation. Searches the entire extension hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        type - Class to search in
        annotation - Annotation to search for
        Returns:
        List of Methods annotated with the given annotation

      • isGenericImplementation

        public static boolean isGenericImplementation(java.lang.Class<?> test,
                                              java.lang.Class<?> clazz1,
                                              java.lang.Class<?>... interfacesArray)
        Check if Class is of generic type Class1<Class2>.
        Parameters:
        test - Class to test
        clazz1 - Class1
        interfacesArray - Interfaces or
        Returns:
        true if it is a generic implementation, false if not

      • checkParametrizedType

        public static boolean checkParametrizedType(java.lang.reflect.Type interfaceType,
                                            java.lang.Class clazz)
        Check if the Type is parameterized and has at least one of its Generic Interfaces is the specified Class
        Parameters:
        interfaceType - Type to search in (ParameterizedType)
        clazz - Class to check for
        Returns:
        true if at least one generic interface is the class specified

      • getGenericType

        public static java.lang.reflect.Type getGenericType(java.lang.Class clazz,
                                                    int index)
                                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Find the Generic Type of the form Class<GenericType>.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class
        index - Index of the Generic Type
        Returns:
        Generic Type
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the Class does not have a Generic Type at the specified position or has none.

      • getInstance

        public static <T> T getInstance(java.lang.Class<T> objectClass)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Helper method to provide an easy access to zero argument constructor instantiation.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the object / class
        Parameters:
        objectClass - Class of the object
        Returns:
        Instance of the object class
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when class does not have a default constructor, instantiation fails or class object is null
